description: {"blocks":[{"key":"cct04","text":"Modified from Korlevic et al 2021\u0026 Rohland et al 2018 for high throughput DNA extraction from historical specimens in natural history collections. Please cite these papers when using this method.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":147,"length":48}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":14,"length":19},{"key":1,"offset":35,"length":18}],"data":{}},{"key":"6t702","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"levc","text":"An in depth SOP by Korlevic can be found here: https://dx.doi.org/10.17504/protocols.io.ewov1o3molr2/v1","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":2,"offset":47,"length":56}],"data":{}},{"key":"f29nm","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dbd2k","text":"Post lysis the protocol can be run by hand or on a magnetic bead based robot (e.g. Kingfisher Flex / Apex). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"900178C4A4B711EDA02B0A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://doi.org/10.1093/gbe/evab226"}},"1":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"90017900A4B711EDA02B0A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://www.nature.com/articles/s41596-018-0050-5"}},"2":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"A6567495A58811EDA02B0A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://dx.doi.org/10.17504/protocols.io.ewov1o3molr2/v1"}}}}

This buffer can be stored at room temperature for at least 1 year.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":5,"offset":52,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"50","error":false,"guid":"89C71D70A4BF11EDBD577D26EF3B28C2","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"49.4","error":false,"guid":"8FCFEA30A4BF11EDBD577D26EF3B28C2","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"2":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"500","error":false,"guid":"986D6B90A4BF11EDBD577D26EF3B28C2","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"3":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"100","error":false,"guid":"9CD29A70A4BF11EDBD577D26EF3B28C2","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"4":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"25","error":false,"guid":"A0FE69D0A4BF11EDBD577D26EF3B28C2","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"5":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"50","error":false,"guid":"B758A1A8A4BF11EDA02B0A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2ec68","text":"Option 1: G-Biosciences Silica magnetic beads (GENO78    6-915)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":10,"length":36}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fq621","text":"Option 2: SeraSil-Mag™ 400 magnetic beads (VWR: 29-3573-69)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":10,"length":31}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8vtv2","text":"Note: Kevin Beentjes (Naturalis) has used the SeraSil beads without washing them with similar recovery to the G-Biosciences beads. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":0,"length":131}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bnhet","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4tj02","text":"The original Rohland protocol washes the G-Biosciences beads before use:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c32f3","text":"Fully resuspend the stock suspension of silica beads by vortexing. ","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8rk2k","text":"Transfer   of silica bead suspension per reaction to a 2.0-ml lobind tube, including an excess of 5% (e.g., for a plate take  ).","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":9,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":125,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"bqtrs","text":"Place the tube on a magnet to collect the beads.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2al8n","text":"Pipette off and discard the supernatant. ","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3nr0e","text":"Remove the tube from the magnet, add   of elution buffer and resuspend the beads by vortexing for 8 seconds. ","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":2,"offset":37,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"17l35","text":"Spin the tubes briefly in a microcentrifuge to collect the suspension at the bottom.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4nncg","text":"Place the tube back on the magnet to collect the beads. ","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7jlbe","text":"Pipette off and discard the supernatant. ","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5qjdp","text":"Repeat steps 5 to 8 for a total of two washes. ","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fksnl","text":"Resuspend the beads in a volume of elution buffer equivalent to the initial volume used (e.g., for a plate add  ).","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":3,"offset":111,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"10","error":false,"guid":"8B3759D0A4C011EDBD577D26EF3B28C2","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"1","error":false,"guid":"FB8F9300A4C011EDBD577D26EF3B28C2","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"2":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"500","error":false,"guid":"974DAE40A4C011EDBD577D26EF3B28C2","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"3":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"1","error":false,"guid":"0F552F8CA4C111EDA02B0A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2kilk","text":"Tissue can be added to the plate/tubes either before or after the addition of lysis buffer, however tissue from dried specimens (e.g. pinned insects) should be added to wells/tubes with lysis buffer to prevent static displacement. If tissue was previously stored in ethanol this should be dried off before lysis.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4dva1","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"euo1k","text":"Add   of lysis buffer C to each sample tube / well. Volume can be adjusted to ensure coverage of tissue, however be mindful that 10x volume of binding buffer is required further down the protocol.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"s9c8","text":"Incubate overnight at   on a shaking incubator. The longer the incubation the more the tissue / specimen is digested. Shorter incubations are recommended for better voucher recovery with whole body lysis.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":22,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"32b1u","text":"Pipette lysate into a new tube / deep-well plate. If tissue / voucher is to be recovered then add appropriate volume of 80% ethanol to cover sample in original tube / well.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dnj59","text":"Add   of binding buffer D (= 10x volume of lysate) to lysate in tube / deep-well plate.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":2,"offset":4,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"bv4m8","text":"Add   of silica magnetic bead suspension to lysate and binding buffer.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":3,"offset":4,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"57j0m","text":"Vortex for 5sec.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"59u0v","text":"Rotate (mix) the tubes / plates for 15min at room temperature.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8dl4v","text":"Spin briefly in a microcentrifuge to collect the suspension at the bottom and place them on an appropriate magnet.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"t4e9","text":"Once solution clears pipette off the supernatant and discard.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9n09o","text":"Remove from the magnet, add   of wash buffer and vortex for 8sec.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":4,"offset":28,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"co2p1","text":"Spin briefly to collect the suspension at the bottom and place back on the magnet. ","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1rl12","text":"Repeat wash (steps 9 - 11) twice for a total of three washes. ","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"eh5ho","text":"Aspirate any remaining drops of liquid and dry the beads at room temperature by leaving them on the magnet with open lids. Usually a few minutes is sufficient.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"29m5r","text":"Remove from the magnet, add   -   of elution buffer depending on original sample size and anticipated DNA recovery.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":5,"offset":28,"length":1},{"key":6,"offset":32,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"c94nu","text":"Vortex until all beads have been resuspended and then briefly spin down.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7dto3","text":"Incubate for 2min at room temperature.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fe6q6","text":"Place back on the magnet, wait until the solution clears and transfer the supernatant to a fresh tube / plate.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dsajd","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"chj16","text":"Proceed to library preparation or freeze extracted {"blocks":[{"key":"6n2n4","text":"The manual protocol has been modified and tested on the Kingfisher Flex and Apex platforms. The protocol starts after step 5 above, i.e. prepare the deep-well plate with   lysate +   binding buffer D and   silica beads.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":170,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":181,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":204,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"bsnpa","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1oncn","text":"The kingfisher protocol uses onboard \"tip mixing\" rather than vortexing / mixing to resuspend beads and skips all centrifugation steps.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9drk9","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"83oji","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"90","error":false,"guid":"AF97A770CF2311EDBEBD1D8D6FC902E7","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"900","error":false,"guid":"B7923210CF2311EDBEBD1D8D6FC902E7","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"2":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"10","error":false,"guid":"BF2DD3D0CF2311EDBEBD1D8D6FC902E7","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}
